LongDescription: <b><i>PRIORITY REPAIRS</i><br clear=left>[Q] 96 St-bound trains run express from Kings Hwy to Prospect Park</b>Days, 9:45 AM to 3 PM, Tue to Thu, Feb 27 - Mar 1<br><br></font>Trains stop at Newkirk Plaza and Church Av.<br><br>For service <i>to </i>Avenue M, Avenue J, Avenue H, Cortelyou, Beverley Rds and Parkside Av, take<br>the [Q] to Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q] or<br>Brighton Beach-bound [B]*.<br><br>For service <i>from </i>these stations, take the [B] or [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza or Kings Hwy<br>and transfer to a 96 St-bound [Q].<br><br><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br></i><b><br>
